name: 10 deaths in a run
desc: Couri dies 10 or more times in a single run

name: 100+ gravel for flint
desc: Couri mines 100 or more gravel before getting any flint

name: 2+ hour run
desc: Takes 2 hours or longer for Couri to complete a single run

name: 3000+ block blind
desc: First portal exiting the nether is 3000 blocks or more away from the nearest stronghold

name: 7+ sub 20s in a row
desc: Couri completes 7 or more consecutive runs in under 20 minutes each

name: 8+ eye portal
desc: Couri finds an end portal that generates with 8 or more eyes

name: Blind outside all rings
desc: Couri blinds from the nether at coordinates that are farther out than the outer edge of the farthest stronghold ring

name: Couri fights a wither
desc: Couri spawns and fights a wither during a run

name: Diamond pick breaks
desc: Couri breaks a diamond pickaxe

name: Dying to berry bush
desc: Couri unintentionally dies to a sweet berry bush

name: Dying to the void
desc: Couri unintentionally falls in the void and dies

name: Fountain bug
desc: Couri encounters a seed that has a bugged end fountain, making it impossible to complete the seed

name: Full netherite
desc: Couri obtains a full set of netherite armor in a run

name: Have to punch the dragon to death
desc: Couri has to punch the ender dragon to kill it because he doesnt have any other ways to kill it.

name: Mansion spawn
desc: Couri spawns on or right next to a mansion

name: Portal room blind
desc: Couri blinds out of the nether and ends up in the portal room

name: Segmented run
desc: Couri has to end stream mid run and continue it the next stream

name: Spawnerless fort
desc: Couri finds a nether fortress that does not have any blaze spawners

name: Stronghold first run
desc: Couri has a run where he finds a stronghold before entering the nether

name: Sub 10
desc: Couri completes a run in under 10 minutes

name: Sub 15 pred
desc: The completion time prediction in Couri's stream whether he completes the run in under 15 minutes

name: Sub 20 recent version run
desc: Couri completes a recent version run in under 20 minutes

name: Three intersecting nether structures
desc: Couri finds three nether structures that are all intersecting

name: Underground spawn
desc: Couri spawns into a world underground (or suffocating)
